api_list.name: /v1/rates/landing
api_list.description: Notice: this method is temporary return rates for USD and EUR currencies only.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hryvna-today.p.rapidapi.com/v1/rates/landing"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hryvna-today.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
